Type.Name: FormatException

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FormatException extends System.SystemException

Type.ThreadingSafetyStatement: All public static members of this type are safe for multithreaded operations. No instance members are guaranteed to be thread safe.

summary.para: Represents errors caused by passing incorrectly formatted arguments or invalid format specifiers to methods.

para.block: is thrown from methods when a being parsed contains characters that are not valid according to the specified style (passed via the parameter) or default style. is thrown from methods when a format specifier (passed via the parameter) is not a valid format for the type of the current instance.

summary.para: Constructs and initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "Invalid format." This message takes into account the current system culture. The property is initialized to .

Docs.param: A that describes the error. The content of is intended to be understood by humans. The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
